医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
营养保健品：探索不受监管的医疗保健领域的潜在好处和挑战营养保健品具有从缓解偏头痛到支持认知等潜在的健康益处，但必须解决安全和监管问题才能有效使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Nutraceuticals-exploring-pottial-benefits-and-challenges-of-an-unregulated-healthcare-frontier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Nutraceuticals-exploring-pottial-benefits-and-challenges-of-an-unregulated-healthcare-frontier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6e420d7-7602-4709-bfbf-13329ed64df9 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 09:02:00 -0500 Nutraceuticals: exploring potential benefits and challenges of an unregulated healthcare frontier
太多的屏幕时间会损害学龄前儿童的睡眠，加剧注意力、情绪和多动问题研究人员研究了屏幕时间如何影响学龄前儿童的行为问题，以及睡眠质量是否介导了这种关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Too-much-screen-time-harms-preschoolers-sleep-fueling-attention-mood-and-hyperactivity-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Too-much-screen-time-harms-preschoolers-sleep-fueling-attention-mood-and-hyperactivity-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dc80bc4-010f-4cee-89ef-e6471153c4da Wed, 18 Dec 2024 08:14:00 -0500 Too much screen time harms preschoolers' sleep, fueling attention, mood, and hyperactivity issues
新的诊断测试可早期发现骨关节炎骨关节炎的诊断通常发生在软骨退化严重的晚期，因此很难将其与其他类型的关节炎区分开来并确定最佳的治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-diagnostic-test-offers-early-detection-of-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-diagnostic-test-offers-early-detection-of-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a91a69c2-2933-476a-b5b1-38cfb1a2662f Wed, 18 Dec 2024 06:59:36 -0500 New diagnostic test offers early detection of osteoarthritis
bit.bio 融资 3000 万美元，由 M&G Investments 领投全球细胞编程技术领导者 bit.bio 今天宣布成功完成由领先的国际储蓄和投资公司 M&G Investments 领投的 3000 万美元融资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/bitbio-raises-2430-million-led-by-MG-Investments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/bitbio-raises-2430-million-led-by-MG-Investments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4c25ae1-1511-4c88-8843-83264249a872 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 06:43:00 -0500 bit.bio raises $30 million led by M&G Investments
自动化系统使用机器人增强中风康复中风数量的增加和随后的康复突显了对有效护理策略的日益需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Automated-system-enhances-中风-rehabilitation-using-robots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Automated-system-enhances-中风-rehabilitation-using-robots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5545bbad-f9d3-4d91-bcee-f0495bf6ce61 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 06:35:01 -0500 Automated system enhances stroke rehabilitation using robots
新药物方法显示出治疗代谢性肝病的前景维也纳医科大学的一项研究发现了一种治疗代谢性肝病的新方法。在一项实验研究中，对在脂肪代谢中起核心作用的酶进行药理学抑制可促进肝脏健康，减少肝脏脂肪、炎症和纤维化重塑（结缔组织疤痕）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-drug-approach-shows-promise-in-treating-metabolic-liver-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-drug-approach-shows-promise-in-treating-metabolic-liver-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6754cf49-6853-45ea-bd78-9dc8a6d73c88 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 06:16:00 -0500 New drug approach shows promise in treating metabolic liver diseases
愤怒长期以来一直笼罩着美国医疗保健的阴影。它很少产生大的变化。 2002 年 2 月美国票房最高的电影包括一部关于驻索马里美军的战争片（《黑鹰坠落》）、一部阿诺德·施瓦辛格的动作片（《附带伤害》），以及一部讲述一位杰出数学家奋斗故事的未来奥斯卡奖得主患有精神分裂症（《美丽心灵》）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Rage-has-long-shadowed-American-health-care-Ite28099s-rarely- Produced-big-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Rage-has-long-shadowed-American-health-care-Ite28099s-rarely- Produced-big-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=856749ae-c1d9-4b86-80c7-77b3bd2c8926 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 05:56:53 -0500 Rage has long shadowed American health care. It’s rarely produced big change.
明智地花在工人福利上的责任如何放松药品福利管理对药品价格的控制安·莱万多夫斯基 (Ann Lewandowski) 了解药品福利管理公司 (PBM)，这些公司塑造了美国药品市场。作为制药商强生公司的政策倡导者，她的工作是向患者和医生团体介绍 PBM 在高药价中所扮演的角色。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/How-a-duty-to-spend-wisely-on-worker-benefits-could-loosen-PBMse28099-grip-on-drug-prices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/How-a-duty-to-spend-wisely-on-worker-benefits-could-loosen-PBMse28099-grip-on-drug-prices.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec8fb513-f60d-4309-96ef-43ea30f3d875 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 05:48:44 -0500 How a duty to spend wisely on worker benefits could loosen PBMs’ grip on drug prices
出租车和救护车司机显示阿尔茨海默病死亡率降低《英国医学杂志》圣诞节期的一项研究发现，与其他职业相比，出租车司机和救护车司机的工作需要频繁的空间和导航处理，因此阿尔茨海默氏病的死亡率最低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Taxi-and-ambulance-drivers-show-reduced-Alzheimere28099s-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Taxi-and-ambulance-drivers-show-reduced-Alzheimere28099s-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4e23573-598f-4b47-b21c-3823f781acbf Wed, 18 Dec 2024 02:15:49 -0500 Taxi and ambulance drivers show reduced Alzheimer’s mortality
非异性恋女性在更年期过渡期间性功能更好女性的性欲可能会随着年龄的增长而减弱，部分原因是更年期过渡期间泌尿生殖系统症状的问题。然而，一些老年女性仍保持着非常活跃的性生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Nonhetero Sex-women-report-better-sex-function-during-menopause-transition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Nonhetero Sex-women-report-better-sex-function-during-menopause-transition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bc1ada0-48c6-4138-9ec5-e533158e6381 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 02:04:19 -0500 Nonheterosexual women report better sexual function during menopause transition
